sentences.sentence: Copies of the completed document transmittal will be retained by the originator.
sentences.translation: 填写完毕的文件传输表的副本，由原件编辑人员保留。

sentences.sentence: As a minimum, submission of documents will be under cover of the BPS external transmittal.
sentences.translation: 至少，文件的提交应遵照英伦管架有限公司(BPS)的文件外部传送要求。

sentences.sentence: An external transmittal is used to issue BPS controlled documents to external organizations.
sentences.translation: 外部传送指，将英伦管架有限公司(BPS)的受控文件发送给外部组织。
